Subject: Seeking  Middleware Test  Mgr (Hands-ON ) and Test engineer.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=204974110

X-eGroups-Remote-IP: 66.94.237.42



Hello,

Pardon the intrusion. My name is Nikki Bell, I am an Onsite 
Technical Recruiter at a  small, well-funded stealth startup that is 
building next generation security and networking hardware for the 
large enterprise space.  Our mission is to change the way security 
is deployed and managed on a global scale.

We are currently seeking a QA Manager and a Sr QA Engineer to join 
our growing team of expert engineers. In this role you will be 
responsible for developing test environment and programs to test our 
security/network management system.  This position in 50% hands on 
and 50% management.

Thnak you . Any referrals would also be greatly appreciated. 
Please contact me at 650-572-8198 .

Responsibilities:

Manage our test development team
Develop an automated test environment
Develop automated regression test suite
Ensure high product quality by testing the product releases in 
various topologies
Escalation & reproduction of customer problems

Required Skills:

7+ years of in-depth experience with API level testing for shipping 
products through multiple releases
2+ years managing or leading a test team
Must have recent hands-on experience participating in test 
development
Extensive experience with Java test automation
Experience with enterprise application testing
Experience with JUnit 
XML & SOAP experience
Experience w/ SQL databases 
Strong scripting skills 
Strong team player and excellent communication skills

Preferred Skills

Experience with Tomcat
Familiarity with Linux
Understanding of TCP/IP Networking


BS in CS or equivalent preferred

We offer competitive salary and benefit packages.

If you are interested in pursuing this opportunity please submit 
your resume for immediate consideration.
subject: Seeking  Middleware Test  Mgr (Hands-ON ) and Test engineer.
